thread.title: Minnesota Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer
thread.title_full: Minnesota Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer

author:
JON KRAWCZYNSKI 
AP writer
title: Minnesota Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer
text:
Timberwolves coach Saunders hospitalized in cancer treatment 
Flip Saunders Minnesota Timberwolves coach Flip Saunders dies of cancer Associated Press | 0 comments 
MINNEAPOLIS â€” Flip Saunders, the longtime NBA coach who won more than 650 games in nearly two decades and was trying to rebuild the Minnesota Timberwolves as team president, coach and part owner, died Sunday, the team said. He was 60. 
Saunders was diagnosed with Hodgkins lymphoma in June and doctors called it "treatable and curable" when the Minnesota Timberwolves made the diagnosis public in August. He took a leave of absence from the team in September after complications arose during his recovery. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You
